/* AllSearchDAO.allSearch */ select '001' as search_type , c.message_no as search_no , c.title , date_format(c.send_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as reg_date , concat(c.receiver_count, '-', c.group_yn, '-', c.reservation_yn) as search_data from tb_message c where c.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and c.send_user_no = #{user_no} and c.group_yn = 'Y' and c.title like concat('%', '', '%') union all select '002' as search_type , c.message_no as search_no , c.title , date_format(c.send_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as reg_date , concat(c.receiver_count, '-', c.group_yn, '-', c.reservation_yn) as search_data from tb_message c where c.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and c.send_user_no = #{user_no} and c.group_yn = 'N' and c.title like concat('%', '', '%') union all select '003' as search_type , a.notice_no as search_no , a.title , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as reg_date , concat(a.notice_type, '-', a.notice_parent_no) as search_data from tb_notice a where a.content_status = '001' and a.notice_type = '002' and a.notice_parent_no = #{hakwon_no} union all select '004' as search_type , a.notice_no as search_no , a.title , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as reg_date , concat(a.notice_type, '-', a.notice_parent_no) as search_data from tb_notice a where a.content_status = '001' and a.notice_type = '003'
and a.notice_parent_no in (select class_no from tb_hakwon_class where hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no})
and a.notice_parent_no in (select class_no from tb_hakwon_class_teacher where hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and teacher_user_no = #{user_no})
union all select '005' as search_type , a.event_no as search_no , a.event_title as title , date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') as reg_date , concat(date_format(a.begin_date, '%Y년%m월%d일'), '-', date_format(a.end_date, '%Y년%m월%d일')) as search_data from tb_event a where a.hakwon_no = #{hakwon_no} and a.event_status = '001' order by reg_date desc
